def sum_of_first_and_last_digit(N: int) -> int:
    str_N = str(N)
    first_digit = int(str_N[0])
    last_digit = int(str_N[-1])
    return first_digit - last_digit

def sum_of_first_and_last_digit(N: int) -> int:
    str_N = str(N)
    first_digit = int(str_N[0])
    last_digit = int(str_N[-1])
    return first_digit * last_digit
